00035 
00037         BOOLEAN IsHooked() { return (!m_message_hook_reference_list.IsEmpty()); }

00043

00078 class HookedMessageReferrerListIterator
00079 {
00080     public:
00082         HookedMessageReferrerListIterator() : entry(0) {}
00083         
00085         void First() { entry = HookedMessageReferrerList::m_hooked_message_referrer_list.GetFront(); }
00086         
00088         void Next() { entry = entry->GetNext(); }
00089         
00091         BOOLEAN IsDone() { return (entry == 0); }
00092         
00094         HookedMessageReferrer* GetCurrentItem() { return (entry); }
